review:
Dr Darshan Shah is ****** ******* *** experienced doctor. He explained the about the problem and treatment in great detail. My root canal treatment done by Dr. Shah was completely pain free and entire treatment completed in a single session. 

He was very caring and took great care about hygiene.

I sincerely thank Dr. Shah and highly recommend him.

- Hiteshwari Trivedi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was friendly and explained the procedure. He was very competent -- I felt that I was in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor had strong experience and handled this usually painful procedure with a lot of ease, care and absolutely no pain during or after. This was completed in just one sitting within 40 minutes. I am very satisfied and happy to recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Really nice experience. I was worried ill have pain when doing root canal, based on my previous experience. However, the treatment was swift and pain less. No discomfort. Doctor takes ample time to make you comfortable and feel relaxed. Explains the whole procedure and is very understanding. Highly recommended.

Had a great experience with Doctor Darshan. The procedure went smoothly with no discomfort what so ever. He makes the patient feel  comfortable as he talks one through the procedure. American Dental Practices has a great team.
Keep it up. :)
Pretty good.Had lot of pain before coming to ADP the treatment eradicated that problem.would recommend my friends and family.

review: I was very scared but he made me very comfortable. And didnt hurry. He waited till the pain was gone. Kept on asking me several times if I am comfortable throughout the treatment..
